sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: Given the sys_id, this operation will retrieve the factory template record
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.inputs: [{"name":"factory_template","value":"","description":"Factory Template","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"crudInputs","value":{"operation":"lookup","table":{"value":"x_snc_15_minute_se_registered_templates","displayValue":"Registered Templates"},"query":"sys_id={{factory_template}}","returnFields":[{"id":"sys_id","sublabel":"sys_id","label":"Sys ID","type":"GUID","referenceTable":null,"referenceTableDefaultField":null,"referenceKey":null,"excludedOperators":[]}],"limit":"1","orderBy":"sys_created_on","sortType":"a_to_z"},"description":"CRUD Input Variables. sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Select a factory template
